channel.title: CVE Feed for iFlyChat Team -- iFlyChat – WordPress Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for iFlyChat Team -- iFlyChat – WordPress Chat

item.title: CVE-2024-31108|2024-08-02T01:46:04.574Z -- iflychat%20team -- iflychat%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20chat
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in iFlyChat Team iFlyChat – WordPress Chat iflychat allows Stored XSS.This issue affects iFlyChat – WordPress Chat: from n/a through 4.7.2.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in iFlyChat Team iFlyChat – WordPress Chat iflychat allows Stored XSS.This issue affects iFlyChat – WordPress Chat: from n/a through 4.7.2.
